title: gcp cloud run deploy
description: deploy a container to cloud run with traffic splitting and iam.
context: prefer min instances for cold starts and least privilege service accounts.
instructions: 1) create/update service with desired cpu/memory/concurrency. 2) configure iam and ingress. 3) set traffic splits for canary. 4) output gcloud commands and yaml.
risks: public exposure if ingress is open.
